category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCIC_co_warn_folder
preference.preference_description: Defines the subfolder used to paste the Item Revision (target) when a Check Out is performed on an Item Revision (source) from the Save Manager and the SpreadSheet Editor. The subfolder is from the HOME folder. The Subfolder will be created during the paste operation if it does not exist. The Subfolder will not be created if the preference is empty This preference is also used by the copy button of BMML
